verses.verse: I have <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H5002>you<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>. Yet ye <S%H559>say<s%>, Wherein hast thou <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H6215>us<s%>? Was not Esau <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s <S%H251>brother<s%>? <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: yet I <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>;

but <S%H6215>Esau<s%> I <S%H8130>hated<s%>, and <S%H7760>made<s%> his <S%H2022>mountains<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation<s%>, and gave his <S%H5159>heritage<s%> to the <S%H8568>jackals<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

Whereas <S%H123>Edom<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%>, We are <S%H7567>beaten<s%> <S%H7725>down<s%>, but we will return and <S%H1129>build<s%> the waste <S%H2723>places<s%>; thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, They shall <S%H1129>build<s%>, but I will throw <S%H2040>down<s%>; and men shall <S%H7121>call<s%> them The <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H7564>wickedness<s%>, and The <S%H5971>people<s%> against whom <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H2194>indignation<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
And your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%>, and ye shall <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> be <S%H1431>magnified<s%> beyond the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

A <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3513>honoreth<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>, and a <S%H5650>servant<s%> his <S%H113>master<s%>: if then I am a <S%H1>father<s%>, where is mine <S%H3519>honor<s%>? and if I am a <S%H113>master<s%>, where is my <S%H4172>fear<s%>? <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> unto <S%H3548>you<s%>, O priests, that <S%H959>despise<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%>. And ye <S%H559>say<s%>, Wherein have we <S%H959>despised<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%>?

Ye <S%H5066>offer<s%> <S%H1351>polluted<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> upon mine <S%H4196>altar<s%>. And ye <S%H559>say<s%>, Wherein have we <S%H1351>polluted<s%> <S%H559>thee<s%>? In that ye say, The <S%H7979>table<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is <S%H959>contemptible<s%>.

And when ye <S%H5066>offer<s%> the <S%H5787>blind<s%> for <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%>, it is no <S%H7451>evil<s%>! and when ye <S%H5066>offer<s%> the <S%H6455>lame<s%> and <S%H2470>sick<s%>, it is no <S%H7451>evil<s%>! <S%H7126>Present<s%> it now unto thy <S%H6346>governor<s%>; will he be <S%H7521>pleased<s%> with <S%H5375>thee<s%>? or will he accept thy <S%H6440>person<s%>? <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

And <S%H2470>now<s%>, I pray you, entreat the favor of <S%H410>God<s%>, that he may be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> unto <S%H3027>us<s%>: this hath been by your means: will he <S%H5375>accept<s%> any of your <S%H6440>persons<s%>? <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

Oh that there were one among you that would <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%>, that ye might not <S%H215>kindle<s%> fire on mine <S%H4196>altar<s%> in <S%H2600>vain<s%>! I have no <S%H2656>pleasure<s%> in <S%H559>you<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, neither will I <S%H7521>accept<s%> an <S%H4503>offering<s%> at your <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

For from the <S%H4217>rising<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun<s%> even unto the going <S%H3996>down<s%> of the same my <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be <S%H1419>great<s%> among the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%>; and in every <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> shall be <S%H5066>offered<s%> unto my <S%H8034>name<s%>, and a <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H4503>offering<s%>: for my <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be <S%H1419>great<s%> among the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

But ye <S%H2490>profane<s%> <S%H559>it<s%>, in that ye say, The <S%H7979>table<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is <S%H1351>polluted<s%>, and the <S%H5108>fruit<s%> <S%H400>thereof<s%>, even its food, is <S%H959>contemptible<s%>.

Ye <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H4972>also<s%>, Behold, what a weariness is <S%H5301>it<s%>! and ye have snuffed at <S%H559>it<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; and ye have <S%H935>brought<s%> that which was taken by <S%H1497>violence<s%>, and the <S%H6455>lame<s%>, and the <S%H2470>sick<s%>; thus ye <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H4503>offering<s%>: should I <S%H7521>accept<s%> this at your <S%H3027>hand<s%>? <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

But <S%H779>cursed<s%> be the <S%H5230>deceiver<s%>, <S%H3426>who<s%> hath in his <S%H5739>flock<s%> a <S%H2145>male<s%>, and <S%H5087>voweth<s%>, and <S%H2076>sacrificeth<s%> unto the <S%H136>Lord<s%> a blemished <S%H7843>thing<s%>; for I am a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>King<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, and my <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H3372>terrible<s%> among the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%>.
